name: Brain Life
tagline: Portal of services for a Brain's life
body:
### This portal hosts a series of projects to support computational neuroscience research.

A new generation of computational neuroscience tools for big data neuroscience. 

### Authors and Contributors
2016 Franco Pestilli (@francopestilli) and Soichi Hayashi (@soichih) Indiana University.

### Support provided by the [National Science Foundation](https://www.nsf.gov/awardsearch/showAward?AWD_ID=1636893).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
